author: rcmatthews
msg: Reorganized the organisation of the root views so that the are now layered on on top of the other allowing dragging, menus, popups and content to be dealt with seperatedly, and  to ease the control of different overalll visual aspects of the views

author: rcmatthews
msg: When status is set (via setStatus method) the painting is done directly so that only the status bar is repainted. All other painting is done through the paint method during next repaint.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Ensuring that you can't delete past the beginning of the password field, causing an exception.
